entry.source: {F812}Director\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403241}From the looks of you... I'd say{F801}you must be human. You're a Hunter,{F801}then?{F801}{F802}...Which means that you're here to{F801}be on the show, right?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Director\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403211}Great. We're ready to begin shooting{F801}right away. Are you ready?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Director\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403211}Great. We're ready to begin shooting{F801}right away. Are you ready?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Director\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403242}All right! Everybody who's going to{F801}be involved in this episode, gather{F801}'round!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Director\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403242}All right! Everybody who's going to{F801}be involved in this episode, gather{F801}'round!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Director\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403242}Well, you'd better get ready, and{F801}quick. We're going to be starting{F801}pretty soon.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Director\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403242}Well, you'd better get ready, and{F801}quick. We're going to be starting{F801}pretty soon.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A number of Hunters crowd around to{F801}hear the Director speak.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A number of Hunters crowd around to{F801}hear the Director speak.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Director\0{F87A,47}{F813,1,403221}Right, let me explain the rules.{F801}{F802}The show's named "RedxWhite Punchdown{F801}Smacktacular!" Team Red and Team White{F801}are going to fight to the death.{F801}{F802}Now, I'm not asking you guys to kill{F801}each other. We're all humans here.{F801}{F802}The humans are all on Team White, and{F801}Team Red is all demons. So you should{F801}be used to this sort of thing, right?{F801}{F802}The only difference is that you're{F801}gonna be doing it on camera.{F801}{F802}Oh, and no rigging the show with your{F801}opponent! Show our viewers the reality{F801}of a Hunter taking down demons!{F801}{F802}...I ought to mention that in the last{F801}episode, Team White was obliterated{F801}almost instantly.{F801}{F802}I hope I get a better show out of{F801}you guys this time around!{F801}{F802}Okay, cameras are rollin'.{F801}{F802}The arena for these battles will be{F801}the streets here in east Shinjuku.{F801}{F802}We've got the streets locked down{F801}during filming, so don't even think{F801}of running. Fight to the bitter end!{F801}{F802}Now get out there and give us some{F801}awesome fights to get our ratings up.{F801}We're live in three... two... one...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403041}Wow, that was something else!{F801}You took on that horde of demons all{F801}on your own!{F801}{F802}...Looks like a good portion of us{F801}Hunters have been killed, though...{F801}{F802}Still, I'm gonna survive and get my{F801}hands on that prize money!{F801}

entry.source: "Yeah."{F801}"Actually, I didn't."{F801}"I feel sorry."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,69}{F813,1,403041}You feel sorry... for the demon?{F801}{F802}After all those Hunters she killed,{F801}you must be something special to be{F801}able to say that.{F801}{F802}I do think you've got a soft heart,{F801}but there's something scary about you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403042}You're strong, man.{F801}Beating that demon.{F801}{F802}.........{F801}{F802}Y'know, everybody squished by that{F801}demon all had these looks on their{F801}faces right before they died...{F801}{F802}It was like... they were incredibly{F801}happy, or caught in a perfect dream,{F801}or something...{F801}{F802}Would you be willing to die, if it meant{F801}being able to feel like that?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hunter\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403042}You're strong, man.{F801}Beating that demon.{F801}{F802}.........{F801}{F802}Y'know, everybody squished by that{F801}demon all had these looks on their{F801}faces right before they died...{F801}{F802}It was like... they were incredibly{F801}happy, or caught in a perfect dream,{F801}or something...{F801}{F802}Would you be willing to die, if it meant{F801}being able to feel like that?{F801}
